persona.name: Sage
persona.bio: Sage, a 25-year-old full-time crypto trader, navigates the volatile world of digital currencies with a blend of impulsive decision-making and a surprisingly traditional approach to market analysis. With intermediate experience, Sage often relies on gut instinct while valuing tried-and-true financial principles, creating a unique blend of spontaneity and convention in their trading strategy. Despite the unpredictable nature of crypto markets, Sageâ€™s bold yet grounded tactics continue to carve a promising path in their trading career.
